name: PertussisTestsForBordetellaPertussisByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Pertussis (Tests for Bordetella pertussis by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bordetella pertussis organism),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Pertussis culture; 

LOINC search: 'Bordetella pertussis (culture or isolate) -panel'),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests)
